diagram:
@startuml
actor Customer
actor Seller
rectangle ECommerceWebsite {
    usecase "Browse Products" as UC1
    usecase "Search Products" as UC2
    usecase "Place Order" as UC3
    usecase "Manage Order" as UC4
    usecase "Add Product to Cart" as UC5
    usecase "Checkout" as UC6
    usecase "Register Account" as UC7
    usecase "Login" as UC8
    usecase "View Product Details" as UC9
}
Customer --> UC1
Customer --> UC2
Customer --> UC3
Customer --> UC4
Customer --> UC5
Customer --> UC6
Customer --> UC7
Customer --> UC8
Customer --> UC9
Seller --> UC7
UC5 .> UC6 : <<include>>
UC3 .> UC4 : <<include>>
UC1 .> UC9 : <<include>>
UC2 .> UC9 : <<include>>
@enduml
raw_diagram:
@startuml
actor Customer
actor Seller
rectangle ECommerceWebsite {
    usecase "Browse Products" as UC1
    usecase "Search Products" as UC2
    usecase "Place Order" as UC3
    usecase "Manage Order" as UC4
    usecase "Add Product to Cart" as UC5
    usecase "Checkout" as UC6
    usecase "Register Account" as UC7
    usecase "Login" as UC8
    usecase "View Product Details" as UC9
}

Customer --> UC1
Customer --> UC2
Customer --> UC3
Customer --> UC4
Customer --> UC5
Customer --> UC6
Customer --> UC7
Customer --> UC8
Customer --> UC9

Seller --> UC7

UC5 .> UC6 : <<include>>
UC3 .> UC4 : <<include>>
UC1 .> UC9 : <<include>>
UC2 .> UC9 : <<include>>
@enduml
